column1:
/I A 
satisfactory  way 
to  arrzve  at  a  verdict  of  guilt  or

innocence 
is 
to  consider  all 
the  matters  before 
the  Court
adduced  whether  by  the  prosecution  or  by  the  defence  in  its

totality  without 
compartmentalising 
and, 
ask 
himself

whether  as  a  prudent  man, 
in 
the  circumstances  of  the
particular case,  he  believes  the  accused guilty of the  charges
